How To Train Your Dragon The Hidden Worl.title: How To Train Your Dragon The Hidden World
How To Train Your Dragon The Hidden Worl.title_name: How To Train Your Dragon: The Hidden World
How To Train Your Dragon The Hidden Worl.description: When Hiccup discovers Toothless isn't the only Night Fury, he must seek the Hidden World, a secret Dragon Utopia before a hired tyrant named Grimmel finds it first.
How To Train Your Dragon The Hidden Worl.cast: Jay Baruchel, America Ferrera, F. Murray Abraham

How To Train Your Dragon 2.title: How To Train Your Dragon 2
How To Train Your Dragon 2.description: When Hiccup and Toothless discover an ice cave that is home to hundreds of new wild dragons and the mysterious Dragon Rider, the two friends find themselves at the center of a battle to protect the peace.
How To Train Your Dragon 2.cast: Jay Baruchel, Cate Blanchett, Gerard Butler
